# omni Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
#
# Set TF_VAR_service_account
#
variable "service_account" {
  type = string
}

#
# Set TF_VAR_omni_uri
#
variable "omni_uri" {
  type = string
}

provider "omni" {
  uri             = var.omni_uri
  service_account = var.service_account
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `service_account` (String) Omni provider attribute
- `uri` (String) Omni provider attribute
